00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_CONSTANT_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_CONSTANT_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         template <class PipelineElement>
00035         class ConstantElement : public PipelineElement
00036         {
00037                 private:
00038                         Real mValue;
00039 
00040                 public:
00041                         ConstantElement (Real value) : mValue(value)
00042                         {
00043                         }
00044                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00045                         {
00046                                 return mValue;
00047                         }
00048                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00049                         {
00050                                 return mValue;
00051                         }
00052                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00053                         {
00054                                 return mValue;
00055                         }
00056         };
00057 
00058         typedef ConstantElement<PipelineElement1D> ConstantElement1D;
00059         typedef ConstantElement<PipelineElement2D> ConstantElement2D;
00060         typedef ConstantElement<PipelineElement3D> ConstantElement3D;
00061 
00065         class ConstantModule : public Module
00066         {
00067                 private:
00068                         Real mValue;
00069 
00070                 public:
00072                         ConstantModule() : Module(0), mValue(0.0)
00073                         {
00074                         }
00076                         void setValue (Real v)
00077                         {
00078                                 mValue = v;
00079                         }
00081                         Real getValue () const
00082                         {
00083                                 return mValue;
00084                         }
00086                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline1D *pipe) const
00087                         {
00088                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ConstantElement1D(mValue));
00089                         }
00091                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline2D *pipe) const
00092                         {
00093                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ConstantElement2D(mValue));
00094                         }
00096                         ElementID addToPipeline (Pipeline3D *pipe) const
00097                         {
00098                                 return pipe->addElement (this, new ConstantElement3D(mValue));
00099                         }
00101                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_CONSTANT; }
00102 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_UTILS
00104                         virtual void write (utils::OutStream &stream) const;
00106                         virtual void read (utils::InStream &stream);
00107 #endif
00108         };
00109 };
00110 
00111 #endif
